title: Angela Rye Interview and More
itunes:title: Angela Rye Interview and More
description:
Friday 4/7- Today on the show our resident political pundit Angela Rye stopped by to speak on the recent events in politics and the entertainment world. Also, Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to a teacher because she asked students inappropriate questions to see how comfortable they are in certain situations. So we opened up the lines to see what are listeners thought about the questions she gave out.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
